items.name: Item A
items.description: An example of an item built within Heathen Engineering's Steamworks.

items.name: Item Generator
items.description:
The values to the left of a generator are weights ... to find the % chance an entry has to generate divide its weight by the sum total of all weights.

This item generator has a 
50% chance to generate Item A .... 100 / (100 + 50 + 50 + 1)
25% chance to generate Item B .... 50 / (100 + 50 + 50 + 1)
25% chance to generate Item C .... 50 / (100 + 50 + 50 + 1)
0.5% chance to generate Item D .... 1 / (100 + 50 + 50 + 1)

items.name: Bundle of generators
items.description:
The numbers to the left of the content item on a generator are the number of items this bundle contains. In this case the bundle will resolve 3 items using the generator linked.

Note that if you expect to sale this bundle on the store it must have a price. This price wont be used unless the 'Use Bundle Price' attribute is provided and set to true ... in this case it is not so we will use the automatically calcualted discount rate. That rate will be 10% off the sum of the items included
